Section.Catchline: Liability after dissolution of general partner and person dissociated as general partner to limited partnership, other general partners, and persons dissociated as general partner.

Subsection.Text: If a general partner having knowledge of the dissolution causes a limited partnership to incur an obligation under s. 620.1804(1) by an act that is not appropriate for winding up the partnership’s activities, the general partner is liable:

Paragraph.Text: To the limited partnership for any damage caused to the limited partnership arising from the obligation.

If another general partner or a person dissociated as a general partner is liable for the obligation, to that other general partner or person for any damage caused to that other general partner or person arising from the liability.

Subsection.Text: If a person dissociated as a general partner causes a limited partnership to incur an obligation under s. 620.1804(2), the person is liable:

Paragraph.Text: To the limited partnership for any damage caused to the limited partnership arising from the obligation.

If a general partner or another person dissociated as a general partner is liable for the obligation, to the general partner or other person for any damage caused to the general partner or other person arising from the liability.
